price: Dir-se-lhe-á: "Não rogueis, hoje. Por certo, não sereis, por Nós, socorridos.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
